all_questions.question: What type of network processes the input sequence of symbols?
all_questions.context: an encoder, it will process the input sequence of symbols into a single vector representation

all_questions.question: What is the purpose of using the representation from the encoder in the decoder?
all_questions.context: to start the decoder given the condensed representation of the input

all_questions.question: What type of network runs the standard language model generation?
all_questions.context: the standard language model generation in the decoder

all_questions.question: What happens to the input sequence after it is processed by the encoder?
all_questions.context: it will be condensed into a single vector representation

all_questions.question: How does the decoder use the output of the encoder?
all_questions.context: given the condensed representation of the input
